aspose.cells
Class ShiftType

Utility class containing constants. Represent the shift options when deleting a range of cells.

Field Summary
const  NumberDOWN
           Shift cells down.
const  NumberLEFT
           Shift cells left.
const  NumberNONE
           Do not shift cells.
const  NumberRIGHT
           Shift cells right.
const  NumberUP
           Shift cells up.
 

Field Detail

DOWN

const Number DOWN
Shift cells down.

LEFT

const Number LEFT
Shift cells left.

NONE

const Number NONE
Do not shift cells.

RIGHT

const Number RIGHT
Shift cells right.

UP

const Number UP
Shift cells up.
